Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' executions that originate from variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' at any point in the case
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events preceded by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in cases where the total amount is above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' activities that occur within two months after the corresponding 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' event
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of 'Payment Handled' to 'Request Payment' occurrences (should be close to 1 if process completes normally)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' that follows a variant including at least one re-submission after rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of total activity executions accounted for by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events grouped by 'case:BudgetNumber'
Percentage of cases where 'Payment Handled' is reached without encountering any 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activity, compared to the total number of completed payment cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Payment Handled' occurs without any prior rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' following the direct path 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE -> Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR -> Request Payment -> Payment Handled'
Percentage of all 'Payment Handled' instances that belong to the top three most frequent successful variants (excluding any rejected paths)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases ending with 'Payment Handled' that never passed through 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' or 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events per year, distinguishing between 2017 and 2018 data
Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in variants that include exactly one approval step (i.e., only 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without intermediate approvers)
